summary: An attractive nord male named Osric awaits companionship at the Sleeping Giant Inn, will you be the one that asks him to follow you on your adventures through Skyrim ?
descriptionHtml:
**Update**
Because of recent events with real life updating this mod an my other follower mod will be postponed till further notice, this does not mean I am abandoning these mods. I just need to take care of a few things outside of Skyrim, among them reformatting my PC and backing everything up, I should be back up an running sometime around June, yes that\'s a ways off but that\'s just how real life is :/ lolz. By that time I should be ready to *Actually* create stand-alone versions that wont require you to hunt down and download all the needed mods per follower :).

**Attractive Nord Male Follower**

**Introduction**

This is my Very first mod I have made for any of the TES Series, so feel free to download an give me feedback where necessary. If there are any conflicts or other issues please post them up so I can fix them if it is due to my mod.

**Description**

This mod adds a new attractive nord male follower named Osric to the Riverwood Inn *The Sleeping Giant Inn*, he is based off of one of my own characters and is setup to auto level with the player and works just like any other follower, able to also be married if you so chose to as well. He is also equipped with some basic spells that he actually does use during combat.


=Acquiring=
Either during a current game or with a new game just head on over to the Sleeping Giant Inn located in Riverwood and he\'ll be the only person wearing Orcish armor with a glass sword.

**Requirements** (These are Must have in order to get the appearance in the screenshots!)

**Install in this order for best results**

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=32085 *None nude version*

Younger faces merged with Men by Geonox, edit by Chris57 + Coverkhajiits by mrLenski
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=26469 *face textures etc*

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=55432 *Hair style*

**Installation**
Its actually very simple if your familiar with TES games and there file systems, Basically just copy and paste the contents into the data folder in the games main directory.

Example:
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data 
**just drop the new files into the data folder and then load up the Skyrim Launcher and check the new .esp file, which should be labeled as Test Follower.esp *yes I know lame :/* lols and that should be all your need to do other then installing the mods I have posted in **Requirements** :D.

**Conflicts**
None that I am aware of at the moment, this mod was fully tested with and without UFO and works completely with it installed.

**Latest Version**

v0.9 Initial Release, Beta

**Future Plans*
Later I plan on making more follower mods based off my characters :D.

**My other Follower Mods**

Attractive Wood Elf Follower
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17000

**Permissions**
Apachii has given me permission to use content related to her mod so long as it doesn\'t over write her\'s, as it is my mod only references to content within her mod, the same can be said about Chris57\'s body mod, how ever his does not use an .esp and my mod does not have any actual reference to his textures/meshes etc, his is only needed for the completed appearance of the follower to appear correctly.

**Terms of Use**
This mod is not to be modified or used in any way other then what I have intended, it is not to be uploaded to any other site other then the nexus, and by me only, it is not to be used in any other mods or games without my consent.
author: Odysseus
